value.title: Apple Insiders Expose iPhone 16 Pro’s Chaotic AI Plans
value.excerpt: The details come from noted supply chain analyst Jeff Pu, who reports that Apple is looking to build a significant number of AI servers in 2023 before scaling up to “significantly more” during 2024. value.title: Millionaire uses Artificial Intelligence to develop life-saving drugs
value.excerpt: As a student Andrew Hopkins came up an idea that would revolutionise the way life-saving drugs are created. Now a professor 16 years later, he has founded his company which uses AI for the discovery and creation of medicine. His company Exscientia is working on a pill to prevent Covid and precision based cancer treatments, among other projects.
